title: January
description: As if being a teenager wasn't rough enough...  The family legend drops into Sylvia's lap, turning her life upside down. Boys who ignored her yesterday are drawn to her like bees to pollen. Her increased appetite might send the family into debt, and then there's the little thing with a murder investigation.  There's nothing Sylvia can do to stop the mayhem, other than survive the Year of the Change.
author: Kathryn Gilmore
